email_chain.subject: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

We are looking to ship 12,000 MT of fertilizer from Santos to Durban. Could you provide a rate estimate for this shipment? We are considering CFR terms and would appreciate details on vessel availability and laycan.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer a rate of USD 45.50 per MT on CFR basis for your shipment. The vessel MV SEA HORIZON is available with a laycan of March 25-28. She has a DWT of 50,000 and an LOA of 190m.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Could you consider revising it to USD 42.00 per MT?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

After reviewing the market conditions, we can adjust our offer to USD 43.50 per MT. This is our best and final offer given the current demand and vessel availability.

Please confirm if this is acceptable so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

We accept your revised offer of USD 43.50 per MT. Please proceed with the booking for MV SEA HORIZON with the laycan of March 25-28. Kindly send us the booking confirmation and further instructions for the shipment.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your confirmation. The booking for MV SEA HORIZON is now confirmed. Attached is the booking confirmation and the proforma invoice for your review. Please arrange for the necessary documentation and let us know if you need any further assistance.

Best regards,
James

[ATTACHMENTS: booking_confirmation.pdf, proforma_invoice.pdf]
